scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.create:stage: npm run build && rm -rf ../stage/build && mkdir -p ../stage && cp -r ./build ../stage && cp ./package.json ../stage
scripts.create:prod: mkdir -p ../prod && if [ -d ../prod/build_current ]; then rm -rf ../prod/build_prev && mkdir -p ../prod/build_prev && mv ../prod/build_current ../prod/build_prev/build && mv ../prod/node_modules ../prod/build_prev/node_modules; fi && rm -rf ../prod/build_current && mkdir -p ../prod/build_current && cp -r ../stage/build/* ../prod/build_current/ && rm -rf ../prod/node_modules && cp -r ../stage/node_modules ../prod/node_modules && echo 'Prod ready with new build'
scripts.deploy:prod: rm -f ../prod/build && ln -s build_current ../prod/build && echo 'Prod symlink switched to build_current'
scripts.rollback:prod: rm -rf ../prod/build_current && rm -rf ../prod/node_modules && mv ../prod/build_prev/build ../prod/build_current && mv ../prod/build_prev/node_modules ../prod/node_modules && echo 'Reverted prod to previous build'
